days.title: Day 1: Welcome to Nostr Advent!
days.description: Discover the decentralized future of social media. Today we explore the basics of Nostr protocol.

days.title: Day 2: Public Key Cryptography
days.description: Learn how Nostr uses public and private keys to create a censorship-resistant network.

days.title: Day 3: Relays Explained
days.description: Understanding how Nostr relays work and why they're essential to the network.

days.title: Day 4: NIPs - Nostr Implementation Possibilities
days.description: Explore the proposals that extend Nostr's capabilities.

days.title: Day 5: Lightning Network Integration
days.description: How Nostr integrates with Bitcoin's Lightning Network for instant micropayments.

days.title: Day 6: Zaps âš¡
days.description: Send value instantly with Lightning zaps on Nostr.

days.title: Day 7: Client Diversity
days.description: Explore the vibrant ecosystem of Nostr clients and applications.

days.title: Day 8: Decentralized Identity
days.description: Your identity belongs to you, not to any platform.

days.title: Day 9: Content Moderation
days.description: How Nostr handles moderation while preserving free speech.

days.title: Day 10: Communities and Groups
days.description: Building communities on a decentralized protocol.

days.title: Day 11: Long-form Content
days.description: Nostr isn't just for short posts - create articles and blogs too!

days.title: Day 12: Media Sharing
days.description: Share images, videos, and files on the decentralized web.

days.title: Day 13: Marketplace Applications
days.description: Buy and sell in a peer-to-peer marketplace built on Nostr.

days.title: Day 14: Event Kinds
days.description: Understanding the different types of events on Nostr.

days.title: Day 15: Private Messages
days.description: Encrypted messaging without centralized servers.

days.title: Day 16: Building on Nostr
days.description: Developer resources and tools for creating Nostr applications.

days.title: Day 17: Nostr Badges
days.description: Achievements, credentials, and digital recognition on Nostr.

days.title: Day 18: Audio and Podcasting
days.description: Decentralized audio content and podcasting on Nostr.

days.title: Day 19: Calendar Events
days.description: Coordinate and share events on a decentralized calendar.

days.title: Day 20: Data Portability
days.description: Your data moves with you - true data ownership.

days.title: Day 21: Nostr Bridges
days.description: Connecting Nostr with other protocols and platforms.

days.title: Day 22: Web of Trust
days.description: Building reputation and trust in a decentralized network.

days.title: Day 23: The Future of Nostr
days.description: What's next for the Nostr protocol and ecosystem.

days.title: Day 24: Join the Movement
days.description: Be part of building the future of decentralized communication!
